大Bank teller 5 working days 15al+1 birthday leave
15k+OT allowance +referral allowance around 17-18k per month

大Bank phone banking 5 working days 18al+1 birthday leave
16k頭3個月, after training & exam 17k
有night shifts allowance +3k
+quarter bonus 10%

Ps fresh grad 2019
